body_html:
I'm not an admin but I wrote the original code. When I wrote it, I saw both my approach and what @patrikerdes, but chose mine because it was simpler and not (that I observed!) a performance problem.

If this patch fixes real performance problems, and the tests pass, we should prefer it.

Thanks for the patch!

body:
I'm not an admin but I wrote the original code. When I wrote it, I saw both my approach and what @patrikerdes, but chose mine because it was simpler and not (that I observed!) a performance problem.

If this patch fixes real performance problems, and the tests pass, we should prefer it. 

Thanks for the patch!
